#summary Information on the Djblets module

= Djblets =

Djblets is a separate but closely linked project containing a number of useful utility functions and classes for use with [http://www.djangoproject.com/ Django]. We make it a goal to put generic code written for Review Board into Djblets for other developers to use.

Djblets is under the MIT license.


== Download ==

Djblets is hosted in a different Subversion repository. You can [http://svn.navi.cx/misc/trunk/djblets browse] the repository or check it out:

{{{
$ svn checkout http://svn.navi.cx/misc/trunk/djblets
}}}


== Documentation ==

While Djblets is documented, there is not yet an online version of this documentation.

See the [http://www.chipx86.com/blog/?p=244 Django Development with Djblets] articles and tutorials to get a feel for what's available in Djblets and how to use it.
